summary: it's a creature animal follower mod
descriptionHtml:
The creature i picked was wispshade they have dismiss follow n wait can relax and if u tell them to go home, they go back to the road into riverwood coming from haglen... the location is the same basically fast travel to riverwood leave like u were headed to embershard mine on that road it take u right to them.


Only noticed 1 minor problem i need to fix follow me dont appear at first u must tell them to wait then say follow me

10/26/2013, I recently started back playing skyrim and notice this follower mod is not working anymore, i am working on correcting this issue.

Updated.

Works fine with AFT

Installation:  extract the version 2 files into your skyrim data folder

I recently found a bug when you use the AFT command skill the fog appears on you too
author: OZZY
